title: That Baby
description: First comes love, then comes marriage . . . and then comes That Baby, the third book in the That Boy series by USA Today bestselling author, Jillian Dodd.It’s amazing how a few little words can change your life. It starts with a simple I love you. It’s made official with I do. And becomes incredible with I’m pregnant.Jadyn is the girl I love. The girl I’ve always loved. Our lives are like single threads meticulously woven together—the result an exquisite tapestry of past, present, and future. Then there are the words that will unravel me. A few little words that will change my life.
author: Jillian Dodd
